Name: Golf98
About the game: Arm yourself with your best club! Important point ! ➡ 2 sets (desert or snow) ➡ Wind very capricious ➡ Addictive! Become the new Tiger Woods! In Golf98 relive your moments of fun in arcade! Make your holes in a minimum of shots and score the highest score! To thwart the force of the wind and make it your ally to reach the hole as quickly as possible! Golf98 will relax you with music and focus on the goal. Who will score the most points?
Meta Title: Golf98: Oct 17, 2019, Studio Inward and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Golf98? Check out the release date (Oct 17, 2019), developer insights from Studio Inward, and a complete game summary.
